item.title: C15 Vitamin C Super Booster
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description:
-Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid) 15%: Visibly improves firmness, fades dark spots, and brightens dull skin. -Ferulic Acid and Vitamin E: Enhance the benefits of vitamin C while protecting skin from environmental damage. -Hyaluronic Acid (Sodium Hyaluronate): Helps skin retain hydration while reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Water (Aqua), Ascorbic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Ethoxydiglycol, Glycerin, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Pentylene Glycol, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Sodium Hyaluronate, Hexanoyl Dipeptide-3 Norleucine Acetate, Lecithin, Ferulic Acid, Panthenol, Bisabolol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Propyl Gallate, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A high-strength serum with 15 percent pure vitamin C to visibly improve skin’s brightness, firmness, stubborn discoloration, and dull and uneven tone.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness

Formulation: Liquid

Highlighted Ingredients:
– Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid) 15%: Visibly improves firmness, fades dark spots, and brightens dull skin.
– Ferulic Acid and Vitamin E: Enhance the benefits of vitamin C while protecting skin from environmental damage.
– Hyaluronic Acid (Sodium Hyaluronate): Helps skin retain hydration while reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan. It is also cruelty-free and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: Formulated at an ideal pH level of three and featuring 15 percent stabilized L-ascorbic acid, vitamin E, ferulic acid, hyaluronic acid, and a targeted peptide, this concentrated serum fades the look of sun damage and post-breakout marks while visibly addressing dullness and loss of firmness for a luminously healthy look.

item.title: Bye Bye Dark Spots 4% Niacinamide Serum
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description:
-Niacinamide: Helps reduce the look of dark spots. -1% Ethyl Vitamin C: Helps to visibly improve skin clarity.
Aqua/Water/Eau, Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Peg/Ppg/Polybutylene Glycol-8/5/3 Glycerin, Hydroxypropyl Tetrahydropyrantriol, Caffeine, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Ppg-6-Decyltetradeceth-30, Salicylic Acid, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Citrate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Potassium Hydroxide, Disodium Edta, Limonene, Geraniol, Citronellol, Tocopherol, Parfum/Fragrance.
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A dark spot corrector facial serum with four percent niacinamide and one percent ethyl vitamin C to visibly reduce dark spots and discoloration to improve skin clarity.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots

Highlighted Ingredients:
– Niacinamide: Helps reduce the look of dark spots.
– 1% Ethyl Vitamin C: Helps to visibly improve skin clarity.

Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan.

What Else You Need to Know: This dermatologist-tested treatment for dark spots on the face is formulated with four percent niacinamide and one percent ethyl vitamin C serums to visibly reduce age spots, melasma, and other discolorations for more even-looking skin. The gentle hyperpigmentation serum is suitable for all skin types, even sensitive.

Clinical Results: In a 12-week consumer self-assessment:
– 87% said skin tone looks more even
– 81% said dark spots look minimized

item.title: AHA 30% + BHA 2% Exfoliating Peeling Solution
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description:
-Glycolic Acid: Exfoliates the outer layers of skin. -Lactic Acid: Exfoliates the outer layers of skin. -Salicylic Acid: Exfoliates inside the pores to reduce congestion.
Glycolic Acid, Aqua (Water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Daucus Carota Sativa Extract, Propanediol, Cocamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Salicylic Acid, Potassium Citrate, Lactic Acid, Tartaric Acid, Citric Acid, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Tasmannia Lanceolata Fruit/Leaf Extract, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Xanthan gum, Polysorbate 20, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol.
item.content:encoded:
What it is: An exfoliating solution to help fight visible blemishes and improve the look of skin texture and radiance.

Skin Type: Normal, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dullness, Uneven Texture, and Acne/Blemishes

Formulation: Liquid

Highlighted Ingredients:
– Glycolic Acid: Exfoliates the outer layers of skin.
– Lactic Acid: Exfoliates the outer layers of skin.
– Salicylic Acid: Exfoliates inside the pores to reduce congestion.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This 10-minute exfoliating facial uses a combined 30 percent AHA (alpha hydroxy acid) and two percent BHA (beta hydroxy acid) to diminish the look of blemishes. It smooths the look of skin texture for a more radiant look.

item.title: Green Tea Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Toner
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description: -5 Types of Hyaluronic Acid: Provide more thorough, amplified hydration. -Green Tea Tri-Biotics™: Hydrate and helps fortify skin’s moisture barrier. -Panthenol: Helps nurture skin. Water/Aqua/ Eau, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Trehalose, Panthenol, Polyglycerin-3, Ppg-13-Decyltetradeceth-24, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance/Parfum, Disodium Edta, Cellulose Gum, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Squalane, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Lactic Acid, Linalool, Limonene, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hyaluronic Acid, Acrylates/Stearyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Ceramide Np.
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A watery toner infused with green tea and hyaluronic acid to deliver thorough hydration and prep skin.
Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness

Formulation: Liquid

Highlighted Ingredients:
– 5 Types of Hyaluronic Acid: Provide more thorough, amplified hydration.
– Green Tea Tri-Biotics: Hydrate and helps fortify skin’s moisture barrier.
– Panthenol: Helps nurture skin.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance.

What Else You Need to Know: This lightweight, moisturizing toner is packed with antioxidants and amino acids from a balanced blend of green tea extracts and skin-nourishing panthenol for a hydrated canvas, ready for the next steps in your skincare routine.

Clinical Results: Based on a 2-week independent consumer study on 30 women ages 20 to 35:
– 100% felt that the product applies smoothly
– 96% felt skin was more hydrated
– 93% felt that skin was soothed with hydration

item.title: Squalane Cleanser
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description: Squalane, Aqua (Water), Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Glycerin, Sucrose Stearate, Ethyl Macadamiate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sucrose Laurate, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Sucrose Dilaurate, Sucrose Trilaurate, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Isoceteth-20, Sodium Polyacrylate, Tocopherol, Hydroxymethoxyphenyl Decanone, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Malic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Chlorphenesin.
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A gentle, moisturizing facial cleanser.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Pores and Dryness

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: This gentle cleansing product is formulated to target makeup removal while leaving the skin feeling smooth and moisturized.

item.title: RESIST Advanced Replenishing Toner with Hyaluronic Acid
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description:
-Hyaluronic Acid: Helps skin retain lasting hydration and reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles. -Linoleic, Oleic, and Linolenic Acids: Visibly diminish dullness and support skin's resilience. -Evening Primrose Oil: An antioxidant-rich, non-fragrant plant oil that rapidly replenishes moisture.
Water (Aqua), Cyclopentasiloxane, Glycerin, Glycerth-26, Polysorbate 20, Dimethiconol, Linoleic Acid, Oleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Phospholipids, Carnosine, Epigallocatechin Gallate, Genistein, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sphingolipids, Ferulic Acid, Laurdimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Acetyl Glucosamine, Quercetin, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root Extract, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Extract, Lecithin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Palmitic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Xanthan Gum, Laureth-23, Laureth-4, Aminomethyl Propanol, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid.
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A softening toner that replenishes essential nutrients, fatty acids, and hyaluronic acid to visibly plump and soothe your skin after cleansing.

Skin Type: Normal and Dry

Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness

Formulation: Liquid

Highlighted Ingredients:
– Hyaluronic Acid: Helps skin retain lasting hydration and reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
– Linoleic, Oleic, and Linolenic Acids: Visibly diminish dullness and support skin’s resilience.
– Evening Primrose Oil: An antioxidant-rich, non-fragrant plant oil that rapidly replenishes moisture.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosanand triclosan. It is also gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging.

What Else You Need to Know: This ultra-hydrating toner feels just like a comforting liquid lotion, enriching skin with essential omega fatty acids and plant-derived antioxidants to improve visible signs of aging and dehydration. Over time, it reinforces the skin’s vital moisture barrier and optimizes its ability to retain hydration.

item.title: Ceramidin™ Skin Barrier Serum Toner
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description:
-Ceramide NP: Supports the skin barrier. -Panthenol: Moisturizes and nourishes skin’s barrier to prevent water loss.
Water/Aqua/Eau, Dipropylene Glycol, Betaine, Propanediol, Alcohol Denat., Glycosyl Trehalose, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Panthenol, Pentylene Glycol, Erythritol, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Triethylhexanoin, Diphenyl Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Ceramide Np, Sucrose Distearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Extract, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, C12-14 Pareth-12, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Tromethamine, Carbomer, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, Glyceryl Stearate, Dextrin, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Citronellol, Disodium Edta, Yellow 5 (Ci 19140).
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A serum and toner that supports the skin barrier, moisturizes, softens, tones, and preps skin for the next step.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture

Highlighted Ingredients:
– Ceramide NP: Supports the skin barrier.
– Panthenol: Moisturizes and nourishes skin’s barrier to prevent water loss.

What Else You Need to Know: This rich liquid combines your serum and toner step for one, potent skincare essential. As a serum, it glides on to form a moisturizing base layer that supports the skin barrier. As a toner, it removes residue and visibly refines skin’s texture. This serum toner is loaded with barrier-supporting ceramide NP and panthenol for moisture and barrier reinforcement.

item.title: Premium BB Tinted Moisturizer with Niacinamide and SPF 40
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description:
-Glycerin: Rapidly moisturizes.
-Mineral and Chemical Sunscreens: Deliver UV protection.
-Niacinamide: Supports skin-barrier strength and protects against environmental stressors.
WATER/AQUA/EAU, CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, CYCLOHEXASILOXANE, GLYCERIN, PEG-10 DIMETHICONE, TALC, HEXYL LAURATE, DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, C12-15 ALKYL BENZOATE, NIACINAMIDE, DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE, CITRUS AURANTIUM BERGAMIA (BERGAMOT) FRUIT OIL, CITRUS LIMON (LEMON) PEEL OIL, CITRUS AURANTIFOLIA (LIME) OIL, PINUS SYLVESTRIS (PINE) LEAF OIL, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) PEEL OIL, ADENOSINE, ALLANTOIN, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, TRIHYDROXYSTEARIN, POLYGLYCERYL-6 POLYRICINOLEATE, METHICONE, DIMETHICONE,DIMETHICONE/VINYL DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, MAGNESIUM SULFATE, EUCALYPTUS GLOBULUS LEAF OIL, LIMONENE, TOCOPHEROL, BHT, PHENOXYETHANOL, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77492), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491), IRON OXIDES (CI 77499) <ILN50730>
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A multitasking, niacinamide-powered cream with a natural-looking finish that hydrates, conceals, and protects.

Coverage: Light

Finish: Natural

Formulation: Cream

SPF: Over 30

Highlighted Ingredients:

– Glycerin: Rapidly moisturizes.

– Mineral and Chemical Sunscreens: Deliver UV protection.

– Niacinamide: Helps improve skin’s barrier

What Else You Need to Know: It’s your moisturizer, your makeup and your sunscreen in one. This BB Cream with SPF 40 seamlessly spreads over skin to deliver lightweight coverage with a natural finish that looks like you. This color corrector comes in 4 flexible, easy-to-navigate shades that adapt to a range of skin tones.

Clinical Results: In a 3-day consumer study of 114 participants:

– 96% said skin tone looks even

– 97% said skin feels moisturized

– 96% said it feels weightless on skin

– 97% said it didn’t leave a white cast

– 96% said skin looks smoother

– 97% said skin looks brighter

– 96% said it leaves a natural looks-like-me finish

item.title: Ultimate Sun Protection Spray Broad Spectrum SPF 50+ For Face/Body
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description: -Rose Apple Leaf Extract: Counteracts oxidation, the process which accelerates skin aging, and helps prevent DNA damage caused by UV rays. -Super-Veil 360: Provides extreme skin protection; allows sunscreen to fit perfectly on the uneven surface of the skin providing high protection from UV rays at all angles. -Profense CEL: Supports natural protection of cells and DNA from UV damage by supporting enzyme activity which is the cause of future uneven skin tone and wrinkles. -Xylitol: Helps keep skin soft and healthy-looking. -Avobenzone 3%, Homosalate 15%, Octisalate 5%, Octocrylene 2.5%, Oxybenzone 5%: Provide sun protection properties.
item.content:encoded:
What it is:
A convenient spray sunscreen that allows quick, easy application over large areas of skin, especially hard-to-reach areas.

What it is formulated to do:
This sunscreen spray provides broad spectrum protection, protecting skin against powerful UV rays, while skin care ingredients maintain skin’s beauty. With its light texture, it feels comfortable with no stickiness or greasy residue. Easy to use, it is water resistant and great for use on face, body, and hair for complete coverage.

What else you need to know:
This product is water-, sweat-, and oil-resistant.

Research results:
Tested by 125 women:
– 95% say the formulation spreads lightly on the skin
– 95% said they want to continue using this product

item.title: Daily UV Defense Invisible Broad Spectrum SPF 36 Sunscreen
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description:
-Avobenzone 2.5%, Homosalate 7%, and Octisalate 4.3%
Water / Aqua / Eau, Butylene Glycol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycrylene, Arachidyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Cetyl Alcohol, Arachidyl Glucoside, Phenoxyethanol, Propanediol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Octyldodecanol, Fragrance / Parfum, Xanthan Gum, Centella Asiatica Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Echium Plantagineum Seed Oil, T-Butyl Alcohol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Cardiospermum Halicacabum Flower/Leaf/Vine Extract, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Leaf Extract, Citrus Unshiu Peel Extract, Opuntia Coccinellifera Fruit Extract, Orchid Extract, Camellia Japonica Leaf Extract, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate.
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A lightweight, daily Broad Spectrum SPF 36 sunscreen delivering invisible sun protection while hydrating and soothing skin – no white-cast, just glow!

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness

Formulation: Lightweight Cream

Highlighted Ingredients:

– Green Tea: Nurtures skin with soothing hydration.

– Cica: Soothes skin and reduces visible signs of irritation.

– Sunflower Seed Oil: Delivers lightweight moisture to skin.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances.

What Else You Need to Know: This sunscreen is infused with a blend of green tea, cica, and sunflower seed oil for three-in-one benefits; it hydrates, soothes, and protects. The lightweight formula delivers undetectable sun protection with SPF 36 while giving skin giving a fresh-looking glow.
